title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a talented Frontend Developer to join our growing team. The ideal candidate has strong skills in React, JavaScript, and CSS, with experience in building responsive web applications. You will work closely with designers, backend developers, and product managers to create intuitive user interfaces.
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience

title: Data Scientist
description: AnalyticsAI is seeking a skilled Data Scientist to help us develop advanced machine learning models. You'll be responsible for processing large datasets, developing predictive models, and collaborating with engineering teams to implement your solutions. Strong background in statistics, machine learning, and programming required.
requiredExperience: 5+ years of experience with data analysis and machine learning
education: Master's or PhD in Statistics, Computer Science, or related field

title: Full Stack Developer
description: WebSolutions is looking for a Full Stack Developer to build robust web applications from the ground up. You will be involved in all aspects of development, from database design to frontend implementation. We need someone who can work independently and as part of a team to deliver high-quality software.
requiredExperience: 4+ years of full stack development experience
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

title: UX/UI Designer
description: DesignForward is seeking a creative UX/UI Designer to create beautiful, intuitive interfaces for our clients. You'll collaborate with product managers, developers, and stakeholders to transform complex requirements into elegant design solutions. Strong portfolio demonstrating your design process is required.
education: Bachelor's degree in Design, HCI, or related field

title: DevOps Engineer
description: CloudScale is looking for a DevOps Engineer to help us build and maintain our cloud infrastructure. You will be responsible for implementing CI/CD pipelines, managing cloud resources, and ensuring the reliability and security of our systems. Experience with AWS and containerization is essential.
requiredExperience: 5+ years of experience in DevOps or SRE roles
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

title: Product Manager
description: InnovateCorp is seeking an experienced Product Manager to drive our product strategy and roadmap. You will work closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to develop and launch successful products. Strong analytical skills and experience with agile methodologies are required.
requiredExperience: 5+ years of product management experience in tech

title: Backend Developer
description: ServerLogic is seeking a Backend Developer to design and implement scalable APIs and services. You'll be responsible for database design, performance optimization, and ensuring the security and reliability of our backend systems. Strong knowledge of Node.js or Python is required.
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: AIFuture is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to develop and deploy ML models at scale. You will work on cutting-edge AI applications, optimize model performance, and collaborate with data scientists to turn research into production-ready solutions. Strong programming skills and ML experience are essential.
requiredExperience: 5+ years of experience in machine learning and software engineering
education: Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related field

title: Mobile Developer (iOS)
description: AppCreators is seeking an iOS Developer to build beautiful and performant mobile applications. You will be responsible for implementing new features, fixing bugs, and optimizing app performance. Strong knowledge of Swift and iOS frameworks is required.
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: SecureShield is looking for a Cybersecurity Analyst to help protect our infrastructure and data. You will be responsible for monitoring security alerts, conducting vulnerability assessments, and implementing security controls. Experience with security tools and knowledge of best practices are essential.
requiredExperience: 5+ years of experience in cybersecurity roles
education: Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity, Computer Science, or related field
